id.description: The unique identifier of this telephony provider edge extension.

name.description: The name of this telephony provider edge extension.

division.description: Details about the division associated with the telephony provider edge extension.

id.description: The unique identifier of the division associated with this extension.

name.description: The name of the division associated with this extension.

selfUri.description: The URI to access the division details.

descriptions.description: Additional information or details about this extension.

version.description: The version of this telephony provider edge extension.

dateCreated.description: The date and time when this extension was created.

dateModified.description: The date and time when this extension was last modified.

modifiedBy.description: The user who last modified this extension.

createdBy.description: The user who created this telephony provider edge extension.

state.description: The state of this telephony provider edge extension.

modifiedByApp.description: The application used by the last modifier when modifying this extension.

createdByApp.description: The application used by the creator when creating this extension.

number.description: The number associated with this extension.

owner.description: Owner details of the telephony provider edge extension.

id.description: The unique identifier of the owner (user/account) of this extension.

name.description: The name of the owner (user/account) of this extension.

selfUri.description: The URI to access the owner's details.

extensionPool.description: Information related to the extension pool used by the telephony provider edge extension.

id.description: The unique identifier of the extension pool this extension belongs to.

name.description: The name of the extension pool this extension belongs to.

selfUri.description: The URI to access the extension pool details.

ownerType.description: The type of the owner (e.g., user or account) of this extension.

selfUri.description: The URI to access the details of this extension.
